# YUNYAN

> 云衍企业级 AI 智能体与数字员工平台，提供从模型到业务流程的一体化落地能力。

This file provides LLM-friendly entry points to documentation and examples.

## Components

- [Android](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/android): A mockup of an Android device.
- [Animated Beam](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/animated-beam): An animated beam of light which travels along a path. Useful for showcasing the integration features of a website.
- [Animated Circular Progress Bar](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/animated-circular-progress-bar): Animated Circular Progress Bar is a component that displays a circular gauge with a percentage value.
- [Animated Gradient Text](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/animated-gradient-text): An animated gradient background which transitions between colors for text.
- [Animated Grid Pattern](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/animated-grid-pattern): A animated background grid pattern made with SVGs, fully customizable using Tailwind CSS.
- [Animated List](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/animated-list): A list that animates each item in sequence with a delay. Used to showcase notifications or events on your landing page.
- [Animated Shiny Text](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/animated-shiny-text): A light glare effect which pans across text making it appear as if it is shimmering.
- [Theme Toggler](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/animated-theme-toggler): A component for theme changing animation.
- [Aurora Text](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/aurora-text): A beautiful aurora text effect
- [Avatar Circles](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/avatar-circles): Overlapping circles of avatars.
- [Bento Grid](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/bento-grid): Bento grid is a layout used to showcase the features of a product in a simple and elegant way.
- [Blur Fade](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/blur-fade): Blur fade in and out animation. Used to smoothly fade in and out content.
- [Border Beam](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/border-beam): An animated beam of light which travels along the border of its container.
- [Client Tweet Card](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/client-tweet-card): A client-side version of the tweet card that displays a tweet with the author's name, handle, and profile picture.
- [Code Comparison](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/code-comparison): A component which compares two code snippets.
- [Comic Text](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/comic-text): Comic text animation
- [Confetti](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/confetti): Confetti animations are best used to delight your users when something special happens
- [Cool Mode](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/cool-mode): Cool mode effect for buttons, links, and other DOMs
- [Dock](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/dock): An implementation of the MacOS dock using react + tailwindcss + motion
- [Dot Pattern](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/dot-pattern): A background dot pattern made with SVGs, fully customizable using Tailwind CSS.
- [Dotted Map](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/dotted-map): A component with a dotted map.
- [File Tree](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/file-tree): A component used to showcase the folder and file structure of a directory.
- [Flickering Grid](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/flickering-grid): A flickering grid background made with SVGs, fully customizable using Tailwind CSS.
- [Globe](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/globe): An autorotating, interactive, and highly performant globe made using WebGL.
- [Grid Pattern](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/grid-pattern): A background grid pattern made with SVGs, fully customizable using Tailwind CSS.
- [Hero Video Dialog](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/hero-video-dialog): A hero video dialog component.
- [Highlighter](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/highlighter): A text highlighter that mimics the effect of a human-drawn marker stroke.
- [Hyper Text](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/hyper-text): A text animation that scrambles letters before revealing the final text.
- [Icon Cloud](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/icon-cloud): An interactive 3D tag cloud component
- [Interactive Grid Pattern](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/interactive-grid-pattern): A interactive background grid pattern made with SVGs, fully customizable using Tailwind CSS.
- [interactive-hover-button](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/interactive-hover-button): The interactive-hover-button component.
- [iPhone](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/iphone): A mockup of the iPhone
- [Lens](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/lens): A interactive component that enables zooming into images, videos and other elements.
- [Light Rays](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/light-rays): A component with animated light rays which shine down from above.
- [Line Shadow Text](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/line-shadow-text): A text component with a moving line shadow.
- [Magic Card](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/magic-card): A spotlight effect that follows your mouse cursor and highlights borders on hover.
- [Marquee](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/marquee): An infinite scrolling component that can be used to display text, images, or videos.
- [Meteors](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/meteors): A meteor shower effect.
- [Morphing Text](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/morphing-text): A dynamic text morphing component for Magic UI.
- [Neon Gradient Card](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/neon-gradient-card): A beautiful neon card effect
- [Number Ticker](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/number-ticker): Animate numbers to count up or down to a target number
- [Orbiting Circles](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/orbiting-circles): A collection of circles which move in orbit along a circular path
- [Particles](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/particles): Particles are a fun way to add some visual flair to your website. They can be used to create a sense of depth, movement, and interactivity.
- [Pixel Image](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/pixel-image): A component that displays an image with a pixelated effect, creating a retro aesthetic.
- [Pointer](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/pointer): A component that displays a pointer when hovering over an element
- [Progressive Blur](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/progressive-blur): The Progressive Blur component adds a smooth blur gradient effect to scrollable content, indicating more content below or above.
- [Pulsating Button](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/pulsating-button): An animated pulsating button useful for capturing attention of users.
- [Rainbow Button](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/rainbow-button): An animated button with a rainbow effect.
- [Retro Grid](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/retro-grid): An animated scrolling retro grid effect
- [Ripple](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/ripple): An animated ripple effect typically used behind elements to emphasize them.
- [Ripple Button](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/ripple-button): An animated button with ripple useful for user engagement.
- [Safari](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/safari): A safari browser mockup to showcase your website.
- [Scroll Based Velocity](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/scroll-based-velocity): Scrolling text whose speed changes based on scroll speed
- [Scroll Progress](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/scroll-progress): Animated Scroll Progress for your pages
- [Shimmer Button](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/shimmer-button): A button with a shimmering light which travels around the perimeter.
- [Shine Border](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/shine-border): Shine border is an animated background border effect.
- [Shiny Button](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/shiny-button): A shiny button component with dynamic styles in the dark mode or light mode.
- [smooth-cursor](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/smooth-cursor): A customizable, physics-based smooth cursor animation component with spring animations and rotation effects
- [Sparkles Text](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/sparkles-text): A dynamic text that generates continuous sparkles with smooth transitions, perfect for highlighting text with animated stars.
- [Spinning Text](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/spinning-text): The Spinning Text component animates text in a circular motion with customizable speed, direction, color, and transitions for dynamic and engaging effects.
- [Striped Pattern](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/striped-pattern): A background striped pattern made with SVGs, fully customizable using Tailwind CSS.
- [Terminal](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/terminal): A terminal component
- [Text Animate](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/text-animate): A text animation component that animates text using a variety of different animations.
- [Text Reveal](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/text-reveal): Fade in text as you scroll down the page.
- [Tweet Card](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/tweet-card): A card that displays a tweet with the author's name, handle, and profile picture.
- [Typing Animation](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/typing-animation): Characters appearing in typed animation
- [Video Text](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/video-text): A component that displays text with a video playing in the background.
- [Warp Background](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/warp-background): A card with a time warping background effect.
- [Word Rotate](https://yunyan.ai/docs/components/word-rotate): A vertical rotation of words

- [Pixel Image Demo](https://github.com/yunyan-ai/blob/main/example/pixel-image-demo.tsx): Example usage

- [Animated Theme Toggler Demo](https://github.com/yunyan-ai/blob/main/example/animated-theme-toggler-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [light-rays-demo](https://github.com/yunyan-ai/blob/main/example/light-rays-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [Dotted Map Demo](https://github.com/yunyan-ai/blob/main/example/dotted-map-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [Dotted Map Demo 2](https://github.com/yunyan-ai/blob/main/example/dotted-map-demo-2.tsx): Example usage

## Optional

- [Repository](https://github.com/yunyan-ai): Source code and issues
- [Sitemap](https://yunyan.ai/sitemap.xml): Indexable pages
